    Classes and interfaces

    Cache_PageWidget¶

    Generates Memcached Output from Symfony Page Widgets

    « More »

    Output_PageWidget¶

    Modifies output to enable auto-generated CDN Paths for assets Note, this class is embedded into the lib/symfony/filter/sfRenderingFilter.class.php Line 53 - 56 AND the plugins/sfErrorHandlerPlugin/lib/sfHardenedRenderingFilter.class.php

    « More »

    PageWidget¶

    Parses Widgets from YML and outputs HTML to Default Symfony Module Note, this class is embedded into the lib/symfony/filter/sfRenderingFilter.class.php Line 53 - 56

    « More »

    SSL_PageWidget¶

    Moves a user between SSL and non-SSL Connections using the SSL Config

    « More »

    Security_PageWidget¶

    Blocks users by IP, using a file-based system of IP and DateTime records.

    « More »

    SeleniumUtil_PageWidget¶

    Utils for Selenium Unit Tests using YML

    « More »

    Selenium_PageWidget¶

    Manages Selenium Unit Tests using YML

    « More »

    TestForm_PageWidget¶

    Manages Line Unit Tests on StyroForms using YML

    « More »

    TestUtil_PageWidget¶

    Utils for Lime Unit Tests using YML

    « More »

    TestWidget¶

    Manages Unit Tests using YML

    « More »

    Test_PageWidget¶

    Manages Lime Unit Tests using YML

    « More »

    Utils_PageWidget¶

    Common Interface for PageWidget classes that refers back to Symfony

    « More »

    WebdriverUtil_PageWidget¶

    Utils for Selenium Webdriver Unit Tests using YML

    Webdriver_PageWidget¶

    Manages Selenium Webdriver Unit Tests using YML

    Widget_PageWidget¶

    Renders Widget Output using a Symfony View
